name: ibn-sina-ecommerce
description: IBN SINA - Medicinal Herbs E-commerce Platform

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:admin
scripts.install:all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../admin && npm install
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend" "npm run start:admin"
